segments.text: So how much should I gamble ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why not fifty or one-hundred dollars ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay . One-hundred then . Do you think I will lose it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know . You have to be smart , but you have to be lucky too.Some games are all luck . With some , you need to be smart .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want games that are all luck .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I knew you would say that ! Then you should play the slot machines .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Slot machines ? No , I don't want that ! That's too boring . I want a game with cards or dice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So what do you want to play then ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Blackjack.We can play blackjack . And I will gamble one-hundred , or maybe two-hundred dollars .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Huh ? You are breaking our rule already ! And we didn't even start to play yet !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , don't be so strict ! We are in Las Vegas .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , and if I stay with you , we will have to walk back home to New York.Because we will lose all our money and our plane tickets too !
segments.speaker: S2
